mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cust_id, prod_cd, prod_name, prod_qty, tot_setl_price) values (#{custId}, #{prodCd}, #{prodName}, #{prodQty}, #{totSetlPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT CUST_ID, (SELECT CONCAT(PROD_NAME, ' 외 ', (select count(*)from cart where CUST_ID=#{custId})-1, '개' ) FROM cart WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} LIMIT 1) prodName , COUNT(*) totProdCnt , SUM(TOT_PROD_PRICE) totPrc , SUM(PROD_QTY) totQty , SUM(EXPCT_DC_PRC) totDcPrc , CASE WHEN SUM(TOT_PROD_PRICE) >= 30000 THEN 0 ELSE 3000 END dlvPrc , (SUM(TOT_PROD_PRICE) - SUM(EXPCT_DC_PRC) + (CASE WHEN SUM(TOT_PROD_PRICE) >= 30000 THEN 0 ELSE 3000 END)) finPrc FROM cart WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId}
